item.title: Pi Mai
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: The No Mames trip took us to Laos to experience their New Year. Through this post we plan to relive Pi Mai festival of Laos ðŸ˜„ What is it about Lao New Year is called ‘Songkran’ or ‘Pi Mai’ in Lao. It is based on the traditional solar new year, that is observed in parts of India and Asia. People throw water on anyone they can, ANYONE! Families get together and make merry.
